reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, comfortable, and suitable for formal events, with positive feedback about its quality and stretchiness. The fit receives mixed reviews, with some finding it perfect while others say it runs like a potato frock. The material quality and fabric weight also get mixed reactions - while some appreciate the nice weight, others note it's heavier than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Elegant and Chic – Perfect for Special Occasions!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is absolutely gorgeous! The square neckline is so flattering and gives it a modern, elegant look, while the slit adds just the right touch of sophistication and a little bit of drama. I wore it to a cocktail party and received compliments all night. The material has a nice weight to it—soft, stretchy, and comfortable without feeling cheap. It hugs in all the right places but still allows you to move and sit easily (which is always a plus for a long dress!). The length was perfect with heels, and the slit made it easy to walk in. Sizing was spot on for me—I ordered my usual size and it fit like a glove. If you’re in between sizes, I’d suggest going with your larger size for the best fit. Overall, this is a stunning, versatile dress that works beautifully for weddings, parties, or any formal occasion. It looks and feels way more expensive than it is. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: StyledWithPaws

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: This dress is beautiful and fits great. I wore it to a wedding that I was a maid of honor in. It has a nice stretch to it and isn’t ridiculously long. I’m 5’2 and it was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. Color is accurate also. Would recommend! Read more
items.author: Sierra Eggers

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress!
items.body: Great fit, super comfy and sexy. The size was spot on. The material is stretchy but not see through. Read more
items.author: heather

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress, But Some Issues
items.body: The dress looks very elegant and the color was exactly as pictured. The square neckline and slit definitely give it a classy, sexy vibe, which is great for a cocktail or formal event. However, the fit was a bit off for me it was tight in the bust and loose around the waist, so it didn’t quite flatter my shape the way I hoped. The material is also a lot thicker than expected kind of heavier material. It’s a decent option for the price. Read more
items.author: Veronica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Elegant
items.body: Fit perfect, just to the floor as in the picture. Right out of package, was not wrinkled at all. Substantial fabric weight and shapely. I bought this to perform in as a vocalist in a group and paired it with a black scarf with silver sparkles and some bling. No fuss - just put this on, added accessories and looked incredibly elegant! Also it swung beautifully with my light dance moves. Read more
items.author: Deborah Edelen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Formal
items.body: Wonderful fit and very comfortable great for a nice formal party. It’s tight in the waist and wide bottomed with a slit up both sides. And it’s a perfect teal Read more
items.author: Dana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Love. Love. Love. Definitely not for shorter girlies as I am 5'9 and still felt like it was too long, even with heels. Fit is great though. Comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Christina M. Jimenez

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No
items.body: This is not true to size. It runs rather large and fits very unattractive and I have an hourglass, evenly distributed shape. I will say the color was beautiful but it simply fit like a potato frock. Read more
items.author: Catherine Habel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Split Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Split Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Teal Color, Purple, Burgundy, Magenta, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
